definition: to take over by force/to rob/to plunder/to brush over/to skim/to sweep
to seize/to take away forcibly/to wrest control of/to compete or strive for/to force one's way through/to leave out/to lose

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Thanks to demonization of Hinduism by British lootersand their evangelists.
sentences.chinese: 感谢英国掠夺者及其布道者对印度教的妖魔化。

sentences.english: These camp robbers hae become habituated to campers as a food source.
sentences.chinese: 这些营地掠夺者已经惯于将野营者作为一种食物来源。

sentences.english: That particular screenshot mentioned shows off a visceral fight between Marauders and Immortals.
sentences.chinese: 这张截屏展示了掠夺者和不朽者的激烈战斗。

sentences.english: Today, many Burmese view China as a pillager of resources.
sentences.chinese: 如今，许多缅族人都把中国看做是一个资源掠夺者。

sentences.english: I'll go into some of the Marauder mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 我会谈下掠夺者的结构。

sentences.english: Faced with a precipice or a predator, the brain is biased to make certain decisions.
sentences.chinese: 面对悬崖或掠夺者，大脑做出的决定会有一定的不同。

sentences.english: The Razorfang Ravager can now be tamed.
sentences.chinese: 剃牙掠夺者现在可以被驯服。

sentences.english: Centaurs – marauders does not have penalty when shooting into support.
sentences.chinese: 半人马掠夺者在近身攻击时不受伤害惩罚。

sentences.english: The wingspan of an MQ1 Predator A model is 55ft.
sentences.chinese: MQ1掠夺者A型的翼展为55英尺。

sentences.english: The looters behaved as if altogether bereft of their senses.
sentences.chinese: 掠夺者表现得似乎全都丧失了理智。

sentences.english: To Romanians Russia is a predator .
sentences.chinese: 而对罗马尼亚人而言，俄国人则是掠夺者。

sentences.english: This and the Marauder are my new favorite Terran units.
sentences.chinese: 维金以及掠夺者是我最喜欢的人族单位。

sentences.english: Shred lightning and rayl, the bear is a taker.
sentences.chinese: 如碎裂的闪电和轰雷一声，巨熊显然是个掠夺者。

sentences.english: Mr. Bolloré is France's top corporate raider .
sentences.chinese: 博洛雷先生是法国顶尖的企业掠夺者。

sentences.english: Slowly the wasters and despoilers are impoverishing our land.
sentences.chinese: 浪费者和掠夺者们在慢慢地糟蹋着我们的土地。

sentences.english: Corporate raiders often raise money by creating funds in the form of partnerships.
sentences.chinese: 企业掠夺者们通常以合伙的形式筹集资金。

definition: Titan (race of deities in Greek mythology, moon of Saturn etc)
